commits.author: CZ
commits.subject: fix: enhance privateRequest logging and handle undefined params in listOrders (#2152)

files.patch:
commit 2be2c216cdfa10df764938f448e7d6b92dfc98fb
Author: CZ <zheng.chen@no-trade-no.life>
Date:   Tue Dec 2 14:23:23 2025 +0800

    fix: enhance privateRequest logging and handle undefined params in listOrders (#2152)

diff --git a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/api/private-api.ts b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/api/private-api.ts
index 51ee68135..6a949c207 100644
--- a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/api/private-api.ts
+++ b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/api/private-api.ts
@@ -3,0 +4 @@ import {
+  formatTime,
@@ -30 +31,3 @@ export const privateRequest = async (
-      url.searchParams.set(key, `${value}`);
+      if (value !== undefined) {
+        url.searchParams.set(key, `${value}`);
+      }
@@ -69 +72,6 @@ export const privateRequest = async (
-  console.info(url.toString(), headers, text, params, body);
+  console.info(
+    formatTime(Date.now()),
+    method,
+    url.toString(),
+    `response = ${text}, requestBody = ${body}, headers = ${JSON.stringify(headers)}`,
+  );
@@ -163 +171,2 @@ export const submitOrder = createPrivateApi<
-    vol: number; // 交易数量
+    vol?: number; // 交易数量
+    size?: string; // 交易数量

commit 2be2c216cdfa10df764938f448e7d6b92dfc98fb
Author: CZ <zheng.chen@no-trade-no.life>
Date:   Tue Dec 2 14:23:23 2025 +0800

    fix: enhance privateRequest logging and handle undefined params in listOrders (#2152)

diff --git a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/listOrders.ts b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/listOrders.ts
index 8e23af975..99a65bc42 100644
--- a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/listOrders.ts
+++ b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/listOrders.ts
@@ -66 +66 @@ export const listOrders = async (credential: ICredential): Promise<IOrder[]> =>
-  return response.data.data.map((order) => mapOrder(order));
+  return response.data.data?.map((order) => mapOrder(order)) || [];

commit 2be2c216cdfa10df764938f448e7d6b92dfc98fb
Author: CZ <zheng.chen@no-trade-no.life>
Date:   Tue Dec 2 14:23:23 2025 +0800

    fix: enhance privateRequest logging and handle undefined params in listOrders (#2152)

diff --git a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/submitOrder.ts b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/submitOrder.ts
index c95aa7055..e2bba4841 100644
--- a/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/submitOrder.ts
+++ b/apps/vendor-turboflow/src/services/orders/submitOrder.ts
@@ -2 +2 @@ import { IOrder } from '@yuants/data-order';
-import { decodePath, formatTime, newError } from '@yuants/utils';
+import { decodePath, newError } from '@yuants/utils';
@@ -41,0 +42,4 @@ export const submitOrder = async (credential: ICredential, order: IOrder): Promi
+  if (order.volume < 1) {
+    throw newError('TURBOFLOW_MIN_ORDER_VOLUME', { volume: order.volume });
+  }
+
@@ -42,0 +47,4 @@ export const submitOrder = async (credential: ICredential, order: IOrder): Promi
+  const leverage = order.volume > 100 ? 100 : Math.floor(order.volume);
+  // 开仓时，保证金不得低于 1 USDC
+  const vol = order.order_direction.includes('OPEN') ? order.volume / leverage : undefined; // usdc 保证金数量
+  const size = order.order_direction.includes('CLOSE') ? order.volume.toString() : undefined; // 头寸名义价值
@@ -52,2 +60,3 @@ export const submitOrder = async (credential: ICredential, order: IOrder): Promi
-    leverage: 1,
-    vol: order.volume, // usdc value
+    leverage,
+    vol: vol, // usdc 保证金数量
+    size: size, // 头寸名义价值
@@ -58,0 +68 @@ export const submitOrder = async (credential: ICredential, order: IOrder): Promi
+    position_id: order.position_id,

commit 2be2c216cdfa10df764938f448e7d6b92dfc98fb
Author: CZ <zheng.chen@no-trade-no.life>
Date:   Tue Dec 2 14:23:23 2025 +0800

    fix: enhance privateRequest logging and handle undefined params in listOrders (#2152)
